title: Chaya Garden Restaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Organic, Western, Juice bar
description: At this location since summer 2012 and switched to all-veg; previously in  Benque Viejo Del Carmen. Chaya Garden ashram and restaurant offers healthy dining emphasizing whole grains, low sugar, vegetarian and raw food. Dairy is used. There's a yoga studio in the building, and the owner also provides massage and sound healing.
streetAddress: beside the waterfall on Cristo Rey Road
